channel.title: Top Delta
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2el8k1f.png[/img][/center] [center][size=10pt][b]Estimated time for testing stage: [u]September 30th[/u][/b][/size][/center]
[size=18pt]Base[/size] ○ Delta of course
○ Hollowfied Dreams is my old base, That I will be working off of. And that would explain why it says "Welcome to Hollowfied Dreams in the first few pictures.[/center]
[s] [/s]
[center] [size=18pt]Server Features/Change Log[/size][/center]
[code]○ Many things in process have been converted to work in events.
○ Economy Adjustments
○ Woodcutting has been completely redone - [s]and it uses events.[/s] Scratch the events part, I've decided that process is reliable for skills, You only need to on events for things that get checked on, every 600 MS. (E.g, Run energy, Walkable interfaces.)
○ Clan Chat has been tweaked with - Leave Chat button working - commands don't give disconnection.
○ Dialogue system redone completely
○ A cool announcement system.
○ Tweaked Slayer (More npcs)
○ Slayer points given to player for finishing a task
○ Slayer points shop
○ Skilling points (Very unique) - Random resources required for what level your Mining, Fishing, and Woodcutting level is. - Thank you to Division from RuneMyth for the idea. =)
○ Updated KBD with new animations, and redid his combat completely.
○ A new quest is being developed. - A reward will be given that many will enjoy =)
○ Npc range/mage system.
○ Delta 3 second wait attack bug fixed.
○ Converted Run Energy updating to events. (actually made a lot of other things run faster.)
○ Redid mining - handled in a separate class.
○ Black Mask & Slayer Helmet effects added.
○ Taverly dungeon where you can find a lot of slayer monsters.
○ I felt that GWD maps would be too over doing it, I'm not trying to perfect anything here, so I've decided to use 317 maps for the bosses! General Graarador, and Commander Ziylana have both been added, but not into the game as content quite yet, I'm going to think real hard on good places for the GWD monsters, they have to fit in with the setting and so on.
○ K'rill Tsutsaroth & General Graarador have both been given areas to be slain.
○ KingdomKey's Special Attack loading added.
○ Grahams Task manager added.
○ RandQm's Pickables added successfully.
○ Lin's correct npc walk up attack fix added. (Tried using the fix that SilabGarza had made, and it really screwed a lot of stuff up. :p
○ Monster drop system completely redone! Items can now have drop rates below 1%.
○ Magic walk up fix
○ Npc freezing added
○ Top Delta is now packaged. Much more cleaner environment.
○ Clipped NPC's[/code]
[s] [/s]
[center][size=18pt]Client Features[/size][/center]
[code]○ 634 Model Header added (Support for items that are in the 634 revision.)
○ 474 anim header added (support for 562 animations.)
○ Loading inventory model using sprites. (Only on some items.)
○ Loading objects through client. (No more objects popping up after logging in.)
○ Clickable links in the chatbox. [/code]
[s] [/s]
[center][size=18pt]Mining[/size][/center]
○ Gaining ores ○ All ores able to be mined ○ All pickaxes ○ Pickaxe level requirements [s] [/s]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img][size=15pt]Woodcutting[/size][/center]
○ Gaining logs ○ All trees able to be chopped ○ All hatchets ○ Hatchet level requirements [s] [/s]
[center][size=18pt]Client Goals[/size][/center]
[center]○ Smaller sized client.[/center]
[s] [/s]
[center] [size=18pt]Media[/size][/center] [s] [/s]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/34smc0z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/xpbpex.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/116quzq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/20gfuat.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1zoje6s.png[/img][/center] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/fw0kzm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2nkl9uu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2pzcqr7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/iygaqd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/qqekw7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/svjj37.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/21kz9ue.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1ifinr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/mcvmad.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2h6fxu1.png[/img] [b]New quest coming soon[/b] ^.^ [s] [/s] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/34ga6wn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1490eg1.png[/img]
[s] [/s] [size=18pt]GIFS[/size] [s] [/s] [b]Rushing, not to overpowered, reworked magic, and some combat! [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2i9tf14.gif[/img][/b] Attack lagg fixed for npcs/players. [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2eq71wk.gif[/img] [s] [/s] [center] [b]Credits[/b]
○ Owner Blade ○ Harry ○ Rog3r ○ Division ○ KingdomKey01 ○ RandQm ○ Lin ○ Shoopdawhoop[/center]

item.title: Top Delta
item.dc:creator: @Shanks Shanks
item.description:
@Shanks wrote:

That’s so true haha! Just converted mining to events, and about to redo fishing.

EDIT: I have been updating the changelog, and have made some progress!

EDIT2: Top Delta is now packaged!

Read full topic

item.title: Top Delta
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

Pblord7:

Fireblades or SilabGarza is the best Delta not this.

Those 2 servers you cant realy call deltas anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Top Delta
item.dc:creator: @Shanks Shanks
item.description:
@Shanks wrote:

Who ever said that this is the best delta? Surely not me. I just want a delta where people enjoyed what they were playing. And thread is being updated as we speak!

Note: The name is just a name, nothing more.

Read full topic

item.title: Top Delta
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

Fireblades or SilabGarza is the best Delta not this.

Read full topic

Thanks!

And you bet, I think It’s fun to program too. But that’s just my opinion.

Goodluck. Delta is a fun source to play.

item.title: Top Delta
item.dc:creator: @Shanks Shanks
item.description:
@Shanks wrote:

[center][/center]
[center][size=10pt]Estimated time for testing stage: September 30th[/size][/center]

[size=18pt]Base[/size]
○ Delta of course

○ Hollowfied Dreams is my old base, That I will be working off of. And that would explain why it says "Welcome to Hollowfied Dreams in the first few pictures.[/center]

[center]
[size=18pt]Server Features/Change Log[/size][/center]

[code]○ Many things in process have been converted to work in events.

○ Economy Adjustments

○ Woodcutting has been completely redone - and it uses events.
Scratch the events part, I’ve decided that process is reliable for skills, You only need to on
events for things that get checked on, every 600 MS. (E.g, Run energy, Walkable interfaces.)

○ Clan Chat has been tweaked with - Leave Chat button working - commands don’t give disconnection.

○ Dialogue system redone completely

○ A cool announcement system.

○ Tweaked Slayer (More npcs)

○ Slayer points given to player for finishing a task

○ Slayer points shop

○ Skilling points (Very unique) - Random resources required for what level your Mining, Fishing, and Woodcutting level is. - Thank you to Division from RuneMyth for the idea. =)

○ Updated KBD with new animations, and redid his combat completely.

○ A new quest is being developed. - A reward will be given that many will enjoy =)

○ Npc range/mage system.

○ Delta 3 second wait attack bug fixed.

○ Converted Run Energy updating to events. (actually made a lot of other things run faster.)

○ Redid mining - handled in a separate class.

○ Black Mask & Slayer Helmet effects added.

○ Taverly dungeon where you can find a lot of slayer monsters.

○ I felt that GWD maps would be too over doing it, I’m not trying to perfect anything here, so I’ve decided to use 317 maps for the bosses! General Graarador, and Commander Ziylana have both been added, but not into the game as content quite yet, I’m going to think real hard on good places for the GWD monsters, they have to fit in with the setting and so on.

○ K’rill Tsutsaroth & General Graarador have both been given areas to be slain.

○ KingdomKey’s Special Attack loading added.

○ Grahams Task manager added.

○ RandQm’s Pickables added successfully.

○ Lin’s correct npc walk up attack fix added. (Tried using the fix that SilabGarza had made, and it really screwed a lot of stuff up.

○ Monster drop system completely redone! Items can now have drop rates below 1%.

○ Magic walk up fix

○ Npc freezing added

○ Top Delta is now packaged. Much more cleaner environment.

○ Clipped NPC’s[/code]

[center][size=18pt]Client Features[/size][/center]

[code]○ 634 Model Header added (Support for items that are in the 634 revision.)

○ 474 anim header added (support for 562 animations.)

○ Loading inventory model using sprites. (Only on some items.)

○ Loading objects through client. (No more objects popping up after logging in.)

○ Clickable links in the chatbox.
[/code]

[center][size=18pt]Mining[/size][/center]

○ Gaining ores
○ All ores able to be mined
○ All pickaxes
○ Pickaxe level requirements

[center][size=15pt]Woodcutting[/size][/center]

○ Gaining logs
○ All trees able to be chopped
○ All hatchets
○ Hatchet level requirements

[center][size=18pt]Client Goals[/size][/center]

[center]○ Smaller sized client.[/center]

[center]
[size=18pt]Media[/size][/center]

xpbpex.png765×503
